message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting strong, but I'm looking for more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go higher!
You're not budging, I'll have to take a firmer stance!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you halfway!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up yet, but I need a serious offer from you!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the last chance!
